Mendokusai

Tartarus

Stress

Published 04 Oct 2018 in Wellbeing / Mental Health

This week at work has been one of the most stressful I have faced so far. I am very excited for the weekend, and the pub tomorrow. I'm still trying to figure out if this is what life is meant to just be like for the next 40 years, or if I'm missing something.
